sentences.english: It is our life – nobody else’s.
sentences.chinese: 这就是我们的生活，没有闲杂人等。

sentences.english: Wear who, food database momentous precincts, person with no duty at, presently and soon quit.
sentences.chinese: 来着何人，粮库重地，闲杂人等，速速离开。

sentences.english: Are you tired of conceiving how to stop miscellaneous personnel from eating in the dining-hall?
sentences.chinese: 您还在为如何阻止闲杂人等到食堂用餐而耗费心神么？

sentences.english: And a mixed multitude went up also with them； and flocks， and herds， even very much cattle.
sentences.chinese: 又有许多闲杂人，并有羊群牛群，和他们一同上去。

sentences.english: Ensure that non HSKP staff and other people are not allowed to enter the store.
sentences.chinese: 确保非本部的人员或闲杂人等一律不准进入货仓。

sentences.english: Both teams are tied atop the Western Conference with the winner taking sole possession of the No. 1 spot.
sentences.chinese: 两支球队闲杂并列西部榜首，胜者将最终独占第一位。

sentences.english: Many other people went up with them, as well as large droves of livestock, both flocks and herds.
sentences.chinese: 又有许多闲杂人，并有羊群牛群，和他们一同上去。

definition: variant of 閒人|闲人[xian2 ren2]/idle person/idler/unconcerned person
an assortment/a bit of everything/lots of different (skills)
everything in disorder (idiom)/in a hideous mess/obscene/dirty/filthy
to be irrelevant/to have nothing to do with
to fiddle with/to play and move sth about/to show off (what one can do)/to parade (one's capabilities)/to cause trouble
to spread malicious gossip/also written 飛短流長|飞短流长[fei1 duan3 liu2 chang2]
